captions.text:
And in case you were
wondering, we've

been in Utah for
two weeks straight.

And the first week we have been
visiting family and friends.

We've been making
tons of new friends.

And we're just at the
end of the first week.

And then our second week,
we're going to see EFY.

So today, we are in the canyon
celebrating my great-grandpa's

And we will keep
blogging and taking

And we are here in the
canyons, as you can see.

We're all celebrating,
just having a ton of fun.

Right now, we're
just working out

cutting out the
stencils for the shirts.

-We'll have to show you
the final products later.
I haven't seen you in forever!

Cause it's you,
only you, only you.
Sing like you know it's true.

Only you can decide
if you see this

through because you
can do anything.
It's you, only you, only you.
Sing like you know it's true.

-There's nothing really
wrong with this book.
It's one of my favorites so far.

title: Our Summer Trip to Utah & EFY Camp

comments.text:
You should try Australian summers....here, Christmas is in summer so a lot 
of people go to the beach on Christmas day and a lot of people go camping 
(as in actual tents) and it's amazing. It can get too hot for foreigners 
though, even down south (110-120 degrees F sometimes).

comments.text:
Last summer I went on a thing called the challenge and we were up by the 
lake district and it was amazing (I live in the UK too) it was only a week 
and we stayed in a youth hostel and we went hiking and canoeing it was so 
cool! I don't usually do this but if you want to see some pics of the lake 
and stuff then you can go to my blog, you don't have to obviously but it 
was amazing :) http://shannonssky.blogspot.co.uk/2014_07_01_archive.html
